manyROC | R package
  • Functions
  • Tutorials and examples

manyROC – tools for ROC analyis

The package is under construction.

Notes:

  1. ROC – receiver operating characteristic.
  2. In documentation, symbol [!!!] means, that the desctription is not finished or imprecise and needs special attention.

Install package:

library(devtools)
install_github("GegznaV/manyROC")
